attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood for his fundraising for NHS
attributes.additional_details: He has raised (at the last count) over £20 million pounds for the NHS and is an inspiration to the whole country
attributes.background: Nominate Captain Tom Moore for. knighthood first services to our country in this time of crisis and his amazing gift of hope to the nation

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
